name: Galdyr
description:
Galdyr is a simulation game/software toy about dragons, magic, time, islands in a sea, and the people that inhabit them. However, you cannot control these people; instead, you can influence the world through magical means to either help or hinder them. Beware, however; using to much magic may cause more trouble than it's worth...

Galdyr allows for a few different methods of play, including a randomized spell mode, a mode where casting spells will use up magic power, and a mode where you manually control an islander. However, it can also be rewarding to set up an island and just let the simulation run for a while.

Along with the game itself, this download also comes with a manual to help new players learn how to play/utilize the game's systems.
